title: China-Linked Evasive Panda Ran DNS Poisoning Campaign to Deliver MgBot Malware
description: A China-linked advanced persistent threat (APT) group has been attributed to a highly-targeted cyber espionage campaign in which the adversary poisoned Domain Name System (DNS) requests to deliver its signature MgBot backdoor in attacks targeting victims in TÃ¼rkiye, China, and India. The activity, Kaspersky said, was observed between November 2022 and November 2024. It has been linked to a
